alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 6:07PM CDT until July 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Union County in south central Arkansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 607 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Cullendale to Louann to near Stephens, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Trees have been downed across Ouachita County, including the city of Camden, with these storms. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Smackover, Norphlet, Huttig, Strong, Calion, Lisbon, Mount Holly, Urbana, Lawson, Wesson, Lapile, Moro Bay State Park, Felsenthal, Newell, New London, Aurelle, Pigeon Hill, Marysville and Cairo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
